questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. Why do you think the cartoon was drawn? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources B and C. The two sources have contrasting views on Singapore's public transport system. Does it mean one of them is unreliable? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source D. How useful is Source D as evidence about the rail transport system? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source E. Are you surprised by what the source says> Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources A-F. How far do the sources agree that Singapore's public transport system is effective? Explain your answer.
